org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.index.lucene.util

Class TapeSampling<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.index.lucene.util.TapeSampling<T>

  • public class TapeSampling<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Sampling algorithm that picks 'k' random samples from streaming input. The algorithm would maintain 'k/N' probability to pick any of the item where 'N' is the number of items seen currently. While the input could be streaming, the algorithm requires N to be known before hand. The algorithm produces random saamples without replacement and hence has O(1) extra memory complexity Implementation inspired from "JONES,T.G. A note on sampling a tape file" (https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=368159)
